mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM blacklist_ips WHERE ip_address = #{ipAddress} AND deleted = FALSE)

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blacklist_ips (ip_address, times, deleted) VALUES (#{ipAddress}, 1, FALSE) ON CONFLICT (ip_address) DO UPDATE SET times = blacklist_ips.times + 1, deleted = FALSE
